content.question: As outlined in the passage, the institutions involved in twentieth-century anti-malarial efforts best illustrate the link between global public health efforts and

choices.label: the development of organizations to safeguard international peace
the development of anti-globalization movements and groups

content.answer: the development of organizations to safeguard international peace

topic.text: 9.2: Technological Advances and Limitations after 1900 - Disease

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
